'''Hydro Mimic Cranes''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Rhodeia of Loch|Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble normal [[Azure Crane]]s.
